data.name: Blade Jumper Demo
data.detailed_description:
Blade Jumper is platformer jump action game.

In 2045, a super-large building was built in the middle of Yeouido, Seoul. The name of the building is Kukuru Tower. You have to enter Kukuru Tower, whose height is unknown, to overthrow the dictatorship that dominates the city. Even if you fall, jump again and go up!

The game is under development with the aim of releasing it in the third quarter of 2002. Please cheer after experiencing the demo game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10 64bit
  • Processor: intel(r) core(tm) i3-7100u cpu @ 2.40ghz
  • Graphics: intel(R) UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10 64bit
  • Processor: intel(R) core(tm) i5-7500 cpu @ 3.40ghz
  • Graphics: intel(R) UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
